quote: Hey, you want to see what a 50 million dollar New York City apartment looks like? Let's go.
why_clipworthy: This moment captures the intrigue and excitement of luxury real estate, appealing to viewers' curiosity.
suggested_hook: Ever wondered what a $50 million NYC apartment looks like? Here's your exclusive tour!

quote: I can create these little 30-second to two-minute to five-minute little vignettes that are entertaining.
why_clipworthy: Encourages agents to use their creativity to create engaging content.
suggested_hook: Think you can't make an impact with short videos? Think again!
